basics.name: Yibo Dong
basics.label: Software Engineering Researcher
basics.summary: Master student in Software Engineering at ECNU with research focus on formal verification, model checking, and automated tools for railway interlocking systems.

awards.title: Bronze Medal (AIGER Track) - HWMCC 2024
awards.summary: Awarded for contributions to SuperCAR, a parallel bit-level safety model checker.

awards.title: M Prize (Top 10%) - Mathematical Contest in Modeling
awards.summary: Team Leader in a mathematical modeling competition.

publications.name: Revisiting Assumptions Ordering in CAR-Based Model Checking
publications.summary: Theoretical analysis and new strategies for literal ordering in SAT solvers.

publications.name: LightF3: A Lightweight Fully-Process Formal Framework for Automated Verifying Railway Interlocking Systems
publications.summary: A framework for formal verification of railway interlocking systems using model checking.
